MACROS-AND-MORE.Dialog.Maintenance.Hint:
Remove all macros or tables in the 'GM Toolkit' Macro directory or RollTable folder, if that folder exists, and import the latest compendium versions.

Any customisations will be lost. Move these out of the GM Toolkit directory first if you want to preserve any changes you have made.
MACROS-AND-MORE.Settings.Maintenance.men: Replace imported GM Toolkit macros and/or tables with latest compendium versions.
MACROS-AND-MORE.MessageNoPermission: You have no permissions for this action
